data.eml:eml: Gryporhynchidae (Cestoda: Cyclophyllidea) in Mexico: species list, hosts, distribution and new records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ortega-Olivares, Mirza P., García-Prieto, Luis, García-Varela, Martín (2014): Gryporhynchidae (Cestoda: Cyclophyllidea) in Mexico: species list, hosts, distribution and new records. Zootaxa 3795 (2): 101-125, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.2.1
